descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

vcs.name: vcs
vcs.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

projectSlug.name: projectSlug
projectSlug.description: Project slug in the form org-name/repo-name
projectSlug.ai_hint: Project slug in the form org-name/repo-name

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

filters.name: filters

options.name: branch
options.description: The name of a vcs branch

filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: branch
options.description: The branch where the pipeline ran. The HEAD commit on this branch was used for the pipeline. Note that branch and tag are mutually exclusive.

options.name: tag
options.description: The tag used by the pipeline. The commit that this tag points to was used for the pipeline. Note that branch and tag are mutually exclusive

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF operation IN ["get", "getAll", "trigger"] AND resource == 'pipeline' THEN SHOW parameter 'vcs'
IF operation IN ["get", "getAll", "trigger"] AND resource == 'pipeline' THEN SHOW parameter 'projectSlug'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'pipeline' THEN SHOW parameter 'pipelineNumber'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'pipeline' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'pipeline' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'pipeline' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'pipeline' AND operation == 'trigger' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
